description:
Soldier reveals his daring plan to return all the toys to their human forms, and Luffy has an emotional encounter with someone from his very distant past!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Luffy Astonished! The Man Who Inherits Ace`s Will!
Luffy Kyougaku: Ace no Ishi o Tsugu Otoko
Une surprise de taille pour Luffy. L’héritier de la volonté d’Ace !
Луффи в шоке! Человек, что получит наследство Эйса!
ルフィ驚愕 エースの意志を継ぐ男
